= Hardware =

There is two type of hardware:

 * Controllers
 * IMU / Sensor boards


== Controllers ==

 * Flyduino: 
it's an ATMega2560 based board. You will find it at the [http://www.flyduino.net Flyduino shop]. Here's a dedicated [http://www.rcgroups.com/forums/showthread.php?t=1381577 thread] about Flyduino products.

 * Seeeduino Mega:
an ATMega1280 based board, you will find it [http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/seeeduino-v221-atmega-328p-p-669.html here].

 * Black Vortex:
it's a controller and IMU board, you will find it in this [http://www.ebay.com/sch/csg_and_rc_extreme/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_from=&_ipg=&_trksid=p3686 Ebay store].


=== IMU / Sensor boards ==

 * FreeIMU 0.3.5 BMP: it's a sensor board with 
   * ITG3205 3-axis gyro 
   * BMA180 3-axis accelerometer
   * HMC5883L 3-axis magnetometer
   * BMP085 absolute pressure sensor
     You will find it at the [http://viacopter.eu/index.php Viacopter shop].

 * FreeIMU 0.3.5 MS: it's a sensor board with
   * ITG3200 3-axis gyro
   * BMA 180 3-axis accelerometer
   * HMC5883L 3-axis compass
   * MS5611-01BA01 Highprecision altimeter
     You will find it at the [http://viacopter.eu/index.php Viacopter shop].

 * Allinone: it's a sensor board with
   * ITG3200 3-axis gyro
   * BMA180 3-axis accelerometer
   * HMC5883L 3-axis magnetometer
   * BMP085 absolute pressure sensor
     you will find it in this [http://www.ebay.com/sch/csg_and_rc_extreme/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_from=&_ipg=&_trksid=p3686 Ebay store].

 * Allinone2: it's a sensor board with
   * ITG3200 3-axis gyro
   * BMA180 3-axis accelerometer
   * HMC5883L 3-axis magnetometer
   * BMP085 absolute pressure sensor
   * NEO-6Q/M GPS receiver 
      you will find it in this [http://www.ebay.com/sch/csg_and_rc_extreme/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_from=&_ipg=&_trksid=p3686 Ebay store].
